# Test bd operations on empty database
# Verifies graceful behavior when database has no issues

bd init --prefix task

# List empty database
bd list
# Should complete without error, no output expected

# Ready on empty database
bd ready
# Should complete without error

# Stats on empty database
bd stats
stdout 'issues\|statistics'

# Attempt to show from empty database
! bd show task-anything
stderr 'not found\|no such'

# Compact empty database
bd compact
# Should complete without error

# Create first issue
bd create 'First issue'
stdout 'Created issue'

# Verify it appears in list
bd list
stdout 'First issue'
